title: Little Mix drive fans wild as they go blonde to open The BRIT Awards 2017 with a raunchy performance
text:
TV Magazine blondes have more fun Little Mix drive fans wild as they go blonde to open The BRIT Awards 2017 with a raunchy performance 
Pop stars all sported lighter locks as they kicked off the show in London Video By Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 22nd February 2017, 8:16 pm LITTLE Mix drove fans wild as they all changed their hair to blonde for their huge performance at The BRIT Awards in London. 
The singers debuted their new looks as they opened the show, and viewers were amazed by the transformation. Getty Images 5 Little Mix all went blonde for tonightâ€™s opening performance 
The singers changed up their look for their opening performance, shortly after walking the red carpet at the O2 Arena in London. 
They looked totally different as they slipped into their stage costumes and embraced a sexy new blonde look. 
Jesy Nelson, Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock were all blonde for the stage show. Getty Images Leigh-Anne Pinnock looked stunning as she showed off her new look Xposure Perrie Edwards showed off her raunchiest moves on stage Xposure 5 Jesy Nelson joined her bandmates by going blonde 
As well as matching their hair, they also all wore saucy silver costumes which showed off their incredible figures. 
The cheeky singers even flashed their bums during a raunchy moment onstage. 
They were performing their hit track Shout Out To My Ex, which was nominated for a BRIT in the Single Of The Year category. Getty Images
